duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for achieving sales targets, strategies, and tactics for the Rinnai assigned territory.
Sales development and growth of Repair and Replace segment, new construction builder Plumbing Contractors, and Commercial Mechanical/Plumbing contractors.
Provide product and installation training to Plumbing contractors and define plans for plumber and commercial client alignment.
Manage and gain alignment with Distribution partners in the Territory, conduct Commercial Jobsite Visits to assist in system commissioning, and resolve customer complaints.

Utilize CRM to manage all sales funnel activities, conduct product knowledge training for distributor sales, and provide monthly detailed account of training, competitive intelligence, and market information.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business or related field and/or equivalent work experience required.
